explanation: [0-0] The video is a split screen. A man wearing a red T-shirt and black headphones sits in front of two snare drums. On the left drum are a white mug, a glass, and a wooden box. In the upper right corner, there's a cartoon of a lamb sitting on a chair with plates on the table, while a wolf holds a bottle of milk.

[0-9] The man in red picks up the glass, pours water from it into the white mug, picks up a black object in front of him and puts it down, then taps the snare drum with his hand. In the split screen on the upper right, the wolf hands the milk to the lamb. The lamb pours out the milk, eats the empty bottle and cap, and then eats the plates on the table.
